Title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
Author: Robert C. Martin
Description: A guide to producing clean, maintainable, and professional-grade code.

Title: Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code
Author: Martin Fowler
Description: A practical guide to improving the design of existing code.

Title: You Don't Know JS: Scope & Closures
Author: Kyle Simpson
Description: Part of the 'You Don't Know JS' series, this book dives deep into closures and scope.

Title: The Pragmatic Programmer
Author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
Description: A classic guide to the best practices of programming.

Title: React Clean Code
Author: Juntao Qiu
Description: A guide to writing clean code with React.

Title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
Author: Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, John Vlissides
Description: A foundational book on software design patterns.

Title: Eloquent JavaScript
Author: Marijn Haverbeke
Description: A book providing an introduction to JavaScript programming.

Title: Introduction to Algorithms
Author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, Clifford Stein
Description: A comprehensive guide to algorithms and data structures.
